      Stream Stream.slidingWindow(int windowCount, int slideCount, WindowsStoreFactory windowStoreFactory, Fields inputFields, Aggregator aggregator, Fields functionFields)
      Returns a stream of tuples which are aggregated results of a sliding window with every windowCount of tuples and slides the window after slideCount.
